Language.span: Acwmen tw Kuriw: endoxwc gar dedoxacye:

Text.Language: Marenhwc e~P[oic: je qen ouw~ou gar af[iw~ou:
Let us praise the Lord, for with glory He is glorified.

Language.span: Touc duo~ k~ticac ic e~na: ton ouranon ke t/n g/n:

Text.Language: Pentafer pic~nau n~ouai: e~te vai pe t~ve nem p~kahi:
He made the two into one, that is the heaven and the earth.
جعل الإثنين واحداً أى السماء والأرض

Language.span: Deute pantec i~lai~: p~roc kun/cwmen I/cou <rictw:

Text.Language: Amwini nilaoc t/rou: n~tenouwst n~I/couc P,#c:
O come, all you peoples, let us worship Jesus Christ.
تعالوا يا جميع الشعوب لنسجد ليسوع المسيح

Language.span: Outoc ectin o~Yeoc o~Cwt/r /~mwn: ke Kurioc pac/c carkoc:

Text.Language: Vai pe V] pencwt/r: ouoh P[oic n~carx niben:
This is God our Savior, and the Lord of all flesh.
هذا هو الله مخلصنا ورب كل جسد

Language.span: Triacen mounadi: ke mounacen t~ri a~di: o~Pat/r ke o~ Uioc: ke to a~gion Pn##a#: to Pn#a# t/c a~l/yiac: a~m/n a#l#.

Text.Language: Out~riac ecj/k e~bol: ecoi n~somt ecoi n~ouai: e~te vai pe Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pn##a# eyouab: Pn##a# n~te ]meym/i: a~m/n a#l#.
Three in One and One in Three: the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit, the Spirit of truth, [the Comforter]. Amen. Alleluia.
ثالوث فى واحد وواحد فى ثالوث ، الآب الإبن والروح القدس روح الحق ، آمين الليلويا.
